reuters.title: CCIC FINANCE LTD - YEAR TO DEC 31
reuters.body: Net profit 16.66 mln H.K. Dlrs vs 11.28 mln Total divs to shareholders 7.5 mln vs nil Note - Firm underwrote 23 capital market issues in 1986. Next industrial transaction in May is syndication of a 35 mln U.S. Dlr loan to the Shanghai Ta Chun Tyre Project. The company is a joint venture merchant bank between the <Bank of China>, <First National Bank of Chicago> and the Industrial Bank of Japan <IBJT.T> REUTER 
